product_summary:
Scribba is a powerful and accurate AI-powered transcription and subtitling tool that can convert audio and video files into text with up to 98% accuracy. It supports multiple languages and offers a variety of features, including: 

* Unlimited uploads
* Fast and accurate results (usually in less than 50% of the audio length)
* Multiple export formats (including SRT, PDF, Word, and Excel)
* Timestamped sentences
* Secure data protection
product_pros: Fast and efficient (results usually in less than 50% of the audio length)
product_cons: May not be suitable for very low-quality audio
Can be expensive for long transcriptions
May not be able to capture all nuances of speech
Can take a while to process very long files

product_usecases.details: Scribba can be used to transcribe interviews quickly and accurately, making it easy to capture and analyze the key points of the conversation.
Scribba can add captions to videos automatically, making them more accessible to viewers who are deaf or hard of hearing, or who speak a different language.
Scribba can be used to transcribe podcasts, making them more accessible to people who prefer to read rather than listen, or who want to search for specific information.
Scribba can be used to create transcripts of legal proceedings, providing an accurate record of what was said.
Scribba can be used to transcribe customer service calls, helping businesses to improve their customer service by identifying common issues and improving their response times.

product_toolfor.details: Scribba can help journalists to transcribe interviews, speeches, and other audio and video content quickly and accurately.
Scribba can help researchers to transcribe interviews, focus groups, and other qualitative data, making it easier to analyze and draw insights.
Scribba can help students to transcribe lectures, interviews, and other educational content, making it easier to study and learn.

Scribba can help businesses to transcribe customer service calls, interviews, and other audio and video content, making it easier to improve customer service, train employees, and conduct market research.

product_toolfor.target: Anyone who needs to transcribe audio or video content
product_toolfor.details: Scribba is a valuable tool for anyone who needs to transcribe audio or video content quickly, accurately, and affordably.

product_pricing: Scribba offers a free tier that includes 30 minutes of transcription and subtitling. Paid plans start at $0.15 per minute of transcription or subtitling, with discounts available for larger volumes.
